reviews.title: Just Excellent option in Mexico City

reviews.text: I have just returned from the Camino Real. I found the hotel to be excellent in all areas ... and the staff extremely friendly and quick to tend to any needs that arose during my stay. The room was huge ... the patio was fantastic and comfortable ... and the red marbled bathroom was much more than expected .... a single bed could have fit into the shower with room to spare. The food at the hotel was very good .... and the service was excellent ..... The price of food at the hotel was extremely reasonable ..... remember that if it says $140 it means in pesos even on the English menu.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: The most important thing to me was that I was not just comfortable but felt very safe staying at the Camino Real. I felt safe walking in the area to the museums and taking a driver and car from the hotel to see other sites in the city which was arranged with superb service by the concierge.
reviews.title: A Great Choice

likes.liked: — Architecturally interesting public areas and comfortable rooms
likes.disliked: — If you have specific room requests and are staying on the Club level, speak to that level directly when booking your room.

reviews.text: If you are like me ... and have never been to Mexico City before .... I would highly suggest you consider this wonderful hotel.
reviews.title: Interesting...

reviews.text: We had a great stay at the Camino Real earlier this month. We were there 4 nights and stayed on the Club level. Each room cost us $170 dollars (a weekend rate, I think). There was plenty of vacancy, so you might try the internet for a better rate or negotiate to get one. We would have done so had we known how (relatively) empty the hotel was (probably not more than 50-60% full). We were glad to have stayed on the Club level.
reviews.title: Great deal at Camino Real

reviews.text: The hotel, as noted by others below, is beautiful and very comfortable. The architecture is great, the public areas clean and elegant, the restaurants excellent (we ate at the Italian one the first night to avoid having to go out and the food was excellent but perhaps a bit pricey), the rooms spacious and nicely designed. Room service was prompt and good, and housekeeping was very responsive. With three kids, safety was important, and we felt very safe in the hotel and allowed our kids to roam around as necessary.
reviews.title: Excellent choice - still a classic
